original_text:
Be warned, my son, of anything in addition to them.
Of making many books there is no end, and much study wearies the body.
korean_text: 내 아들아 또 이것들로부터 경계를 받으라 많은 책들을 짓는 것은 끝이 없고 많이 공부하는 것은 몸을 피곤하게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: of anything in addition to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들 외에 다른 어떤 것에 대해서도.

sentences.original_text: Of making many books there is no end,
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 책을 만드는 것은 끝이 없고,

sentences.original_text: and much study wearies the body.
